entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reading a file in with StreamReader and writing it out with StreamWriter unconditionally adds a BOM when encoding detection is enabled #91362
  • [wasm] Update WBT to use tfm=net9.0 #91357
    9.0.0
  • NativeLib is ignored without PublishAot #91353
    Future
  • [wasm] Consider using `targetingpacks.targets` instead of duplicating the logic in Wasm.Build.Tests #91350
    9.0.0
  • Assert "rank < MAX_RANK" in runtime/src/coreclr/classlibnative/bcltype/arraynative.cpp Line: 812 #91349
  • TFM compat logic for binding generator NuPkg doesn't account for custom TFM strings #91348
    8.0.0
  • [wasi] out of bounds memory access in System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Tests #91344
  • Failing test - System.Reflection.Tests.TypeTests.TestIsValueType #91341
  • Failing test - System.Tests.Types.ModifiedTypeTests.TypeMembers #91339
  • Failing test - System.Reflection.Tests.TypeTests.TestBaseType #91338
  • Assertion failed '(node->GetHWIntrinsicId() == NI_Vector64_Create) || (node->GetHWIntrinsicId() == NI_Vector128_Create) || (node->GetHWIntrinsicId() == NI_Vector64_CreateScalarUnsafe) || (node->GetHWIntrinsicId() == NI_Vector128_CreateScalarUnsafe) || (node->GetHWIntrinsicId() == NI_AdvSimd_DuplicateToVector64) || (node->GetHWIntrinsicId() == NI_AdvSimd_DuplicateToVector128) || (node->GetHWIntrinsicId() == NI_AdvSimd_Arm64_DuplicateToVector64) || (node->GetHWIntrinsicId() == NI_AdvSimd_Arm64_DuplicateToVector128)' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #91336
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '(reinterpret_cast<size_t>(addr) & (byteSize - 1)) == 0' during 'Emit code' #91335
  • [mono] Runtime crash in full AOT mode when using `LiteDB` #91332
    9.0.0
  • C# Dapper Transaction Scope is not rollbacking for DB2 Provider #91326
  • Bad codegen with Vector256/Vector512 #91325
  • Compiler error when using configuration binder source generator with custom collections #91324
    8.0.0
  • [browser] Clean-up argument processing in test-main.js #91321
    9.0.0
  • [nodejs] bad option: --experimental-wasm-simd #91318
    8.0.0
  • Unable to build dotnet/runtime source code locally with dot net framework 4.6.2 as target framework #91316
  • Microsoft.Extensions.SourceGeneration.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBinderTests.GetCanReadStaticProperty test failing #91308
  • [API Proposal]: Please reinstate CustomMarshalers.TypeToTypeInfoMarshaler for COM #91307
    Future
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGenerationRollover #91304

Closed

  • Android NTLM: Empty Credentials now throws PlatformNotSupportedException #91131
  • SSL RemoteCertificateNameMismatch when targeting net8.0 #89118
    8.0.0
  • Fix source-gen issue with a binding member access expression being on a separate line from the member expression #90851
    8.0.0
  • `Http2_MultipleConnectionsEnabled` test failures #91075
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!varTypeIsUnsigned(type) || varTypeIsSmall(type)' during 'Generate code' #91174
    8.0.0
  • Calling AssemblyLoadContext.Unload multiple times causes fatal crash #91087
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'm_store->TypeGet() == m_src->TypeGet()' #91062
    8.0.0
  • Failing test - System.Reflection.Tests.TypeTests.TestBaseType #91340
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.SourceGeneration.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBinderTests.GetCanReadStaticProperty #91188
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Fast cache-contention aware counters #91319
  • Assertion failed '!childNode->isContainableHWIntrinsic()' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #91170
    8.0.0
  • [8.0] [mono] Test process gets killed #90834
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM: certain startup errors don't trigger error pop-up in the UI #91276
    8.0.0
  • Error on `TimeZoneInfo.FromSerializedString` #91312
  • PeriodicTimer bug when cancelling with token #91204
    7.0.x
  • [7.0] Can't exec into pod anymore (exit code 138 - SIGBUS) - increased memory with net7.0 #88824
    Future
  • The "while" loop doesn't enter when it is referenced by an asynchronous method #90972

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Options Source Gen Fixes #91363
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2256435 #91360
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Update binder gen emitted-interceptor nullability to match framework impl #91359
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Share more code between ILLink/ILCompiler test infra #91358
    needs-area-label
  • Add DebuggerTypeProxy to ListDictionaryInternal #91355
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Remove DirectoryInfo.ToString() from ref assembly #91354
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [DependencyInjection] introduce feature switch to disable S.R.E #91352
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Fix impNonConstFallback #91345
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ARM64] Add g_GCShadowEnd to JIT_WriteBarrier_Table #91342
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add link to docs to interop error messages #91328
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 9.0.0
  • [wip] Testing StackTraceMetadata tests on tvos #91322
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] make sure that no assets errors are lost #91320
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [draft][browser] Run unit tests on multithreaded runtime with multithreaded xunit runner #91317
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, os-browser
  • [browser] Print message arguments in forwarded console #91315
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] ELT Profiler Bring-Up #91313
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0] Fix implementation of NegotiateAuthentication.Wrap for Kerberos on Windows #91311
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Fix allocation in DateTime.TryParse when it returns false #91303
    area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • [FileSystemWatcher] Linux - Guarantee that we do not hold onto a strong reference of the watcher #91301
    area-System.IO

Merged

  • Make handling of DefaultCredentials in NegotiateAuthentication/SocketsHttpHandler more consistent #91160
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Remove implicit narrowing conversions from zlib #91245
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Start running the SharedLibrary test again #91356
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix nullable annotation for Validator.ValidateValue ref source #91351
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2256251 #91347
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Fix crash when calling AssemblyLoadContext.Unload twice #91346
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Emit interceptor info correctly when invocation expr is on separate line #91218
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [DependencyInjection] introduce feature switch to disable S.R.E #91133
    tenet-performance, os-android, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/8.0] Ensure the relevant containable nodes are handled #91334
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Update browser template to use Wasm SDK #91046
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix Http2 MultiConnection test race conditions #91343
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Fix warning in class-internals.h #91314
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enable SuperPMI collection of a libraries tests run #91101
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix illegal IR created by GetElement/ToScalar lowering #91272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert Options source generator nullable annotation changes for Validator.TryValidateValue #91305
    area-Extensions-Options, 9.0.0
  • Fix crash when calling AssemblyLoadContext.Unload twice #91283
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [mono][metadata] Replace use of mem manager lock with loader lock #91327
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Start sharing code between ILLink/ILCompiler test infra #91284
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Enable trimming for crossgen2 publishing and fix symbol bug #91135
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add comments to binding gen tests for invocations on new lines #91237
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] UMEntryThunkCode::Poison() #91221
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Ensure the relevant containable nodes are handled #91287
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][metadata] Replace use of mem manager lock with loader lock #91190
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove fixed bug from issues.targets #91294
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update issue link for issue moved from runtimelab #91310
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • Implement IDirectoryContents on PhysicalDirectoryInfo #91024
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • Use live illink to trim framework #91233
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Support Windows based ECDSA SignedCms #91247
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Add error message for loading assembly with incompatible architecture #91289
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [browser] [wasm] Request Streaming upload #91295
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Check for generic structs in "needs marshalling" check #90836
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Initial commit for libraries directory #90203
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix nullable annotation for Validator.TryValidateValue and ValidateValue #91293
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, 8.0.0
  • Upgrade our TFM to net9.0 #90880
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Mono] Fix offset calculation for nested struct, when pinvoke is enabled #91292
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix Dispose and SendData Race on Http3 Test #91291
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement
  • Improve perf of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #91290
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add New Test to Track Number of Jitted Methods #91235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Adding a naive implementation of various primitive tensor operations #91228
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasm symbols #91241
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add support for 128-bit integers to BitConverter #91299
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Test hot/cold splitting in runtime-coreclr crossgen2 pipeline #91217
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add blazor startup measurements to browser-bench #91199
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • avoid allocations for TLS handshake #87874
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Type load checks do not fail at compile time but produce a runtime exception #91261
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fix formatting of assertion failures and fail-fasts #91300
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bump Microsoft.Private.Intellisense package version #91285
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add optimisation of incrementing SELECT at lowering on arm64. #91262
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Optimize OP_R8CONST and OP_R4CONST on Arm64 #91225
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Remove some unused headers and functions #91177
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "Baseline Native AOT tests (#86366)" #90184
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [WIP] new synchronization mechanism for DATAS #90726
    area-GC-coreclr
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch to python generated source #91140
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Feature Request]: I think it should be more obvious if your build results in a self-contained app/deployment #35041
  • ```dotnet run``` should populate a DOTNET_LAUNCH_PROFILE environment variable #35027

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Update the sdk target to net9.0 #35031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add DOTNET_LAUNCH_PROFILE environment when invoking dotnet run #35029
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Fix possible NullReferenceException due to &/&& typo #35026
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Move to granular opt-in for interceptors preview #35024
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Enable interceptors feature when ConfigurationBindingGenerator is enabled #35045
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, 8.0.1xx
  • Fix workload info #35044
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Containers: DefaultManifestOperations.PutAsync: log failure response and include status code in exception. #35040
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Updated

  • Create project templates target to 9.0 #34996
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • 9500 dotnet tool install: Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade when specify version #31549
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add test for PublishSingleFile+PublishAot #34948
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Prefer docker tool when both podman and docker are present #34909
    Area-Containers, 8.0.1xx
  • Add better error messages when we can't fetch manifests #34460
    untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.1xx
  • Change containers publish target to require IsPublishable (and explicit SDK Container support) #34980
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2256349 #34880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Razor with renamed compiler DLLs #34928
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35023
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Diagnostics not refreshed in FSA with editorconfig option changes #69763
  • Flag unused parameters of primary constructors #69762

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34030.147 #69768
  • Expand Generator ETW telemetry to include step information #68402
    17.8
  • CSC : error CS7038: Failed to emit module '_': Unable to determine specific cause of the failure. #69579
    17.8
  • Collection expressions: inapplicable overloads considered in overload resolution #69634
    17.8
  • WellKnownFixAllProviders.BatchFixer does not apply fixes in auto-generated code #69739
  • Getters of unreferenced properties get optimized out #69757
  • IDE0059 is unnecessary in Primary Constructors #69643
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump telemetry for fix on ExeName/Version #69771
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: support builder methods returning derived or implementing types #69770
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update PublicAPI for 17.7 #69767
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Remove EditorFeatures.Cocoa and VSMac IVTs #69765
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.6 #69761
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.4 #69760
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Upgrade MSBuildLocator to 1.6.1 #69769
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #69766
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Report missing diagnostic for typeless expression in binary operation #69727
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expression conversions: check elements are convertible #69627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Work around restore issue #69710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add comment and bug link for static graph restore false #69759
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Bail out for primary constructor parameters in IDE0059 analyzer #69748
    Area-IDE, IDE-CodeStyle, untriaged, Feature - IDE0059, Next
  • Use raw strings in EditorFeatures tests #69729
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.4 #69648
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Run design time builds out-of-process #69616
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Lazily build a case-insensitive comparison for performance #69756
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve GetNextToken / GetPreviousToken perf #69740
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Trim ToString calls when converting to interpolated strings when there are interpolated string handlers available. #69723
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix the ArgumentOutOfRangeException in inline rename #69708
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve interpolated string handler compilation error #69671
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.8
  • Reduce cascading diagnostics on failed implicit conversion #69170
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update "Current Document" background analysis semantics #69750
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add fuzzer for incremental generators #68903
    Area-Compilers, Test, 17.8

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet watch test` doesn't appear to run the tests and restarts multiple times without file changes on Mac M1 #50441
  • IKeyManager / XmlKeyManager - Fail intermittently in load balanced scenarios #50440
  • Please improve error message on deserialization problem #50439
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50436
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50435
  • Perf improvement: json #50434
  • Root-level interactivity option for the new Blazor Web project template #50433
    8.0-rc2
  • Cannot run an action filter before ModelStateInvalidFilter #50432
  • Frequent 502 Bad Gateway responses when making post request to aspnetcore based service. #50429
  • Dynamically-added SSR content breaks if it includes script tags #50424
    8.0-rc2
  • Update jquery-validation dependency in templates to the latest version #50421
    8.0-rc2

Closed

  • Add equivalent of HttpRuntime.AppDomainAppId available at all times when hosted in IIS #43632
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Form Validation isn't working (doesn't seem to validate anything) #50420
  • Consider restoring the Blazor WebAssembly "hosted" option #49798
    8.0-rc2
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #50423
  • Inconsistent refresh token field naming between /login and /refresh in Identity endpoints #49482
    8.0-rc2
  • SignalR Hub with Azure API Management #50418
  • Order of action filters is not respected when using synchronous and asynchronous filters #49488
  • Dockerise ASP.NET Core app with Alpine image #50399
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #50405
  • Needed guidance for a memory usage #50370
  • support AttributeUsage AttributeTargets.Class for minimal api handlers #50101

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50443
    area-networking, area-runtime
  • Increment HubProtocol version for Stateful Reconnect #50442
    area-signalr
  • [Blazor] APIs to preserve content between enhanced navigations #50437
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Form mapping support for select multiple, logging, DataMember and other improvements/cleanups #50431
    area-blazor
  • Fix Set size in HttpLoggingOptions #50426
    community-contribution, area-middleware, area-runtime
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50422
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Fix typo in method name StopTrasnsportTracking -> StopTransportTracking #50416
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-runtime, 9.0-preview1
  • Update Microsoft.IdentityModel to 7.0.0-preview4 #50415
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc2
  • Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50128
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Call AddMetrics inside AddRouting #50168
    area-networking, area-routing, 8.0-rc2

Updated

  • Update SDK to 9.0.100-alpha.1.23421.9 #49911
    area-infrastructure
  • HttpLogging redaction and enrichment #50163
    area-middleware, 8.0-rc2
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Delay component activation until the initial page loads completely #50345
    area-blazor
  • Fix corrupted streaming SSR output #50380
    area-blazor, .NET 8 Planning
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2256280 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Fix incoming connections with same ID sometimes failing incorrectly #50417
    area-signalr
  • Make IEmailSender more customizable #50301
    area-identity

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CLRMD don't provide StackBase and StackLimit for full memory dumps #4198

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve dotnet-dsrouter log levels and info. #4199

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Blazor release version fine, published version fails #17116
  • [test] Add a test for the fix in #17023 #17115
  • [tests] Enable RefreshView device tests #17114
    Backlog
  • [Android] Border content should be centered like iOS when resizing #17111
  • [Windows] Border content is not correctly clipping and aligning #17109
  • Slower webview inside MAUI #17106
  • How to hide the password hint which is showing when the entry is focused #17105
  • RightToLeft in .NET MAUI is completely messed and not functioning the same on iOS and Android #17098
  • Issue in Grid column sizing #17097
  • RightToLeft in .NET MAUI is completely messed and not functioning the same on iOS and Android #17096
  • An error was encountered while registering a service worker js script in the MAUI Blazor Hybrid application #17095
  • Cannot connect to mac after updating to VS 17.7.3 #17089

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Border clips on the bottom and right #16667
    .NET 8 GA
  • Add Platform-specific properties for Drag and Drop Gesture Recognizer EventArgs #16992
    .NET 8 GA
  • Grid rows not sizing properly on Windows #16857
    .NET 8 GA
  • Can't connect Visual Studio with Mac due to microsoft.net.sdk.ios.manifest v16.4.7098 missing from nuget.org #17077
  • Some images are not shown on Windows #17054
  • Delay in BackgroundColor update for Button in Release mode #17056
  • [regression/8.0] Android app crashes with an ANR on .NET 8 preview 6 #16418
    .NET 8 GA
  • Tapped event in TapGestureRecognizer is not raised up when add span dynamically #17113
  • [MAUI]Some pictures could not be loaded. #16851
    .NET 8 GA
  • Cannot add Mica backdrop to Maui Blazor hybrid app #16874
  • [regression/8.0.0] - RefreshView does not hide spinner when IsRefreshing set to false. #16910
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0-preview 4] Border with RoundRectangle Corner Radius values are smaller than they were #14936
    .NET 8 GA
  • RoundRectangle StrokeShape produces a different result on iOS vs Android #14276
    Under Consideration
  • Unable to click controls in a CarouselView in iOS #16867
  • Shell content navigation does not navigate to correct view #9765
    Backlog
  • Not found Microsoft.macOS.Sdk.Msi.x64 (13.3.7098) #17101
  • Pull to refresh on RefreshView does not hide the refresh indicator. #8926
    .NET 8 GA
  • Nightly Builds fail to compile #17040
    8.0-rc1
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc1] [Android] Removing ItemSource item in ListView causes crash #17028
    .NET 8 GA
  • FontImageSource blurry on IOS in button and imagebutton #14728
    .NET 8 GA
  • [RC1] - iOS FontImageSource in AppShell TabBar Pixelation #6043
    .NET 8 GA
  • ClickGestureRecognizer is not functional #16739

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ValueObject == null, Property could not be translated #31593
  • DetectChanges changes EntityEntry.OriginalValues #31592
  • C# Dapper Transaction Scope is not rollbacking for DB2 Provider #31590
  • double 0 saves as 1 ??? #31589

Closed

  • Feature Enhancement: Nondestructive bundling and rewriting of migrations #31591
  • superfluos JOIN on query conflicts with SQL RLS #31588
  • How to implement role based Authorization For Blazor WASM accessing Cosmos Document DB via EF Core? #31503

PullRequests

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31582
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • SQLite: Fix casting between int and char #31585
  • Validate complex properties are not null when saving #31584
